activities: In connection with providing services to Badgeville’s customers, Badgeville may access personal information about Badgeville’s customers’ consumers in the EU and Switzerland. Our customers act as the data controller for any such consumer data collected in the EU and Switzerland and subsequently transferred to Badgeville in the United States. Badgeville acts as a data processor on behalf of its customers with respect to such consumer data and accordingly only carries out the instructions of such customers with regard to the collection, processing, and protection of such consumer data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Our organization does not require, but may process personal data our customers receive from their end-users that our customer then submits to us online.  Our organization does not manually process any personal data.
privacyprograms: n/a; AICPA SOC 2 audit over the security
